# Project Classification

**Technical Type:** Developer Tool + Infrastructure Management API + AI Integration (MCP Server)
**Domain:** DevOps Infrastructure / Message Queue Management
**Complexity:** Medium-High (distributed systems, AI protocol integration, security-critical)

**Project Classification Rationale**:
- **Developer Tool**: Primary interface is MCP protocol for AI assistants, plus CLI for direct use
- **API/Backend**: Core is HTTP Management API client with AMQP protocol for messaging
- **Infrastructure Management**: Manages production RabbitMQ clusters (queues, exchanges, bindings, messages)
- **AI Integration**: Model Context Protocol (MCP) server with semantic operation discovery
- **Security-Critical**: Handles credentials, audit trails, enterprise compliance requirements

---
